name: Mad jump
description:
Mad jump

A small Hypercasual mobile game made for a school project by a team of 4 developpers including : Cédrick, Rowan and me. 

Jump side to side to avoid obstacles and ennemies to reach the end of the level ! 

Controls : 

tactile : Tap

Assets used in this project : 

https://luizmelo.itch.io/martial-hero

https://brotherdaniel.itch.io/crystal-knight

https://lionheart963.itch.io/wizard

https://free-game-assets.itch.io/free-shield-2d-items-pack

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/fantasy-gui-pack-17387
